snippet: Ruben Diaz Jr.’s endorsement was not much of a surprise, given that he had been a vocal supporter of William C. Thompson Jr. in 2009, but his endorsement had been coveted by all the major Democratic candidates.
abstract: Ruben Diaz Jr.’s endorsement was not much of a surprise, given that he had been a vocal supporter of William C. Thompson Jr. in 2009, but his endorsement had been coveted by all the major Democratic candidates.

headline.main: Thompson Gets Key Endorsement From Bronx Borough President
